sitedescription: Launched in 2011, Gear Hungry is an independent digital magazine focused on one thing: digging up the best gear for guys from all corners of the internet. Every week, we sift through thousands of updates from hundreds&nbsp;web magazines, blogs, retailers and other product compendiums, then hand pick the best amongst them for publishing. Our&nbsp;minimalist, content-focused design and Retina-quality images provide little distraction from what you’re really here for – the goods.
